amendment.description: Amendment inserts sense of Congress language that railway transportation security has been and must continue to be a priority of the intelligence community in infrastructure threat assessment, namely through the coordination of the Office of Intelligence & Analysis.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 112-200 to express the sense of Congress that railway transportation security has been and must continue to be a priority of the intelligence community in infrastructure threat assessment, namely through the coordination of the Office of Intelligence & Analysis.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carney amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 303 - 92 (Roll no. 696).
